paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class view.InitPanel
This function is use to draw on the panel, here we draw the baseTile of the player creating his pyramid.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class view.MainPanel
This function is use to draw on the panel, here we draw the K3.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class view.PlayerPanel
This function is use to draw on the panel, here we draw the pyramid of the player.
panelP1 - Variable in class view.UI
panelP1 is the PlayerPanel that contains the player 1 information, in the left position in the gamePanel.
panelP2 - Variable in class view.UI
panelP2 is the PlayerPanel that contains the player 2 information, in the right position in the gamePanel.
parameterPanel - Variable in class view.UI
parameterPanel is the JPanel that contains the parameter.
part - Variable in class view.MainPanel
part is the active part of the game.
part - Variable in class view.PlayerPanel
part is the active part of the game.

This function play the penalty.
penalty() - Method in class player.Player
This function is unused for a real player.

This function handle the case when a player have a penalty.
penaltyPyramid(Coordinates) - Method in class controller.K3
This function handle the case when a player have a penalty.
playBonusTile(int) - Method in class game.PlayerPyramid
This function turn the tile in the bonusTile to an empty tile.
player - package player
 
Player - Class in player
 
Player(String) - Constructor for class player.Player
This constructor define the name and put the victoryNumber and loseNumber at 0.
playerNumber - Variable in class view.PlayerPanel
player Number is the index where the player is in players.

PlayerPyramid - Class in game
 
PlayerPyramid() - Constructor for class game.PlayerPyramid
This constructor initialise every variable, plus put every tile in the pyramid as empty or Gray.
players - Static variable in class controller.K3
players is a list of 2 players that contains the 2 players designated to play.
playersPyramid - Static variable in class controller.K3
playersPyramid contains the two pyramids of the player playing.
playerTime - Static variable in class controller.K3
playerTime contains the two time that player took to make their pyramid.
playPyramid(Coordinates) - Method in class game.PlayerPyramid
This function turn the tile at the coordinate to an empty tile and add, if needed, the new approachable tile to approachableTile.
playPyramid() - Method in class player.AIRandom
This function play a tile on the K3.
playPyramid() - Method in class player.Player
This function is unused for a real player.
playSidePyramid() - Method in class player.AIRandom
This function play the part when the K3 is full.
playSidePyramid() - Method in class player.Player
This function is unused for a real player.

pyramid - Static variable in class controller.K3
pyramid is the K3.
pyramid - Variable in class game.PlayerPyramid
pyramid is a pyramid of tile with a base of 6, it's represent the pyramid of the player.
Pyramid - Class in game
 
Pyramid() - Constructor for class game.Pyramid

pyramid - Variable in class game.Pyramid
